name: Desolation (SigneToHe, Francis-KI, Julius Winther, runeludvigsen, VengeanceU, FireZage)
name_original: Desolation (SigneToHe, Francis-KI, Julius Winther, runeludvigsen, VengeanceU, FireZage)
description:
Game Jam Themes: Light and Darkness (random category), flick (mechanic category) and Game Jam sound number 41 (sound category). 

Controls: Single player, point and click for walking and holding spacebar for flicking. 

Creators: 
Atle Søeborg Nyhus
Franciska Kruse Ifversen
Hector Thøgersen
Julius Winther
Lukas Harkamp
Rune Ludvigsen
Signe Toftgaard Henriksen
